content: *peter and petra measure about 5 5 inches from the top of the ears to the bottom of the feet * **you will need…** yarn color a - white or preferred color for bunny yarn color b - desired color for dress or overalls yarn color c - small amount of pink yarn for nose 3 25mm crochet hook size d 10 mm safety eyes or desired size fiberfill stuffing yarn needle sewing pins to hold pieces in place before sewing optional **stitches and abbreviations used…** chain - chain sl - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet st - stitch sts - stitches repeat - repeat increase - increase 2 single_crochet in the same space decrease - decrease or decrease single_crochet 2 together
